title: Bloomberg Markets: Sherr on Evolution of U.S. Open Sponsors

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Lew Sherr Chief Revenue Officer USTA National Tennis Center Inc Discussing new sponsors, innovations and experiences at the U.S. Open.
